memberdef.argsstring: (q31_t *pSrc, uint32_t fftLen, const q31_t *pATable, const q31_t *pBTable, q31_t *pDst, uint32_t modifier)
memberdef.name: riscv_split_rfft_q31

detaileddescription.para:
end of RealFFT group
pSrc
points to input buffer
fftLen
length of FFT
pATable
points to twiddle Coef A buffer
pBTable
points to twiddle Coef B buffer
pDst
points to output buffer
modifier
twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table
none

memberdef.argsstring: (q31_t *pSrc, uint32_t fftLen, const q31_t *pATable, const q31_t *pBTable, q31_t *pDst, uint32_t modifier)
memberdef.name: riscv_split_rifft_q31

parameterdescription.para: points to twiddle Coef A buffer
points to twiddle Coef B buffer
twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table

briefdescription.para: Processing function for the Q31 RFFT/RIFFT.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the Q31 RFFT/RIFFT structure

simplesect.title: Input an output formats
simplesect.para: Internally input is downscaled by 2 for every stage to avoid saturations inside CFFT/CIFFT process. Hence the output format is different for different RFFT sizes. The input and output formats for different RFFT sizes and number of bits to upscale are mentioned in the tables below for RFFT and RIFFT:

para.image: Input and Output Formats for Q31 RFFT
Input and Output Formats for Q31 RIFFT
